ygData.subject: RE: Wind (was: [eqbards] Brass)
ygData.msgSnippet: course SSC doesn t have to be the Arena, you can practice Wind with invis safely in any city.  and the Arena is not risky at the zone, just once you enter the
ygData.messageBody:
course SSC doesn't have to be the Arena, you can practice Wind with invis
safely in any city. and the Arena is not risky at the zone, just once you
enter the fighting area (is that correct?). but like Talies i chose the
tunnel between east commons and north ro to practice Brass, way back as far
as i could get in the shady swashbuckler room, went from 5 to 150 in one
night, and never hit a creature.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 22 High Elf Paladin
Tyria, Level 10 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server

e: [eqbards] Wind (was: [eqbards] Brass)

>

>

>
> (of course you have to be level 18 for DDD, and level 19 for SSC)
>
> Harmonic Distortion, 31st ding.
> League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
> < Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
